direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods compare dates but focus on different date components (year vs. day, month, and year).
Both methods compare dates but focus on different date components (year vs. month and year).
Both methods compare dates but focus on different date components (year vs. quarter and year).
Both methods compare dates but focus on different date components (year vs. week and year).
Both methods involve date validation and parsing, which can be used to generate test inputs for date comparison.

enhanced_by.reason: The validate method can be used to generate valid Date objects for testing the compareYears method.
The getCalendar method is used internally by compareYears to convert Date objects to Calendar objects, which is a critical step in the comparison process.
The compareDates method can be used to verify the results of the compareYears method, as both return comparison results.
